title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4204.6 - Denial of license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4204.6 - Denial of license

State Regulations

The commission may refuse to issue a license to conduct a
race meeting with pari-mutuel wagering when, in its judgement, such refusal
shall appear to be in the best interest of racing and of the
public. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4204.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
